summary: The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.
cast: Colm Meaney|Henry Goodman|David Roper|Jimmy Reddington|Oliver Stokes|Ryan Day|Michael Sheen|Mark Bazeley|Timothy Spall|Maurice Roëves|Stephen Graham|Peter McDonald|Mark Cameron|Frank Skillin|Dylan Van Hoof|Sydney Wade|Elizabeth Carling|Jim Broadbent|Mark Jameson|Liam Thomas|Glenn Cunningham|Tony Gubba|Gillian Waugh|Brian McCardie|Martin Compston|Colin Harris|Giles Alderson|Stewart Robertson|Laurie Rea|Michael Parkinson|Ralph Ineson|Philip Childs|Terence Harvey|Gordon Hall|John Craven|Isabella Eades-Jones|Joe Dempsie|Paul Bown|Christopher Chilton|Tomasz Aleksander|Muhammad Ali|Christopher Anderton|David Aspinall|Bax Baxter|Matt Blackhall|Brian Clough|Ross Donnelly|Alex Harker|Nathan Head|Carole Hersee|Jimmy Hill|Tobias James-Samuels|Kevin Keegan|James MacColl|James Mansell|Mark Mathieson|Chris Moore|Stephen Nicholas|Paul O'Brien|Don Revie|Alexander Rogerson|John Savage|Brendon Selley|David Stevenson|Elliot Stroud|Peter Taylor|Danny Tomlinson|Craig Williams|Chris Wilson
title: The Damned United
